name: Heather Jones Bennett
text: Bob was so helpful and knowledgeable. He stocked the part I needed and repaired my phone in 2 hours. The level of service I received was top notch and is rarely seen nowadays. 5 stars and 2 thumbs up! He also sells phones for great prices.

name: SaintMegery15
text: So, walked in and was promptly greeted. Explained that I needed my screen replaced on my iPhone. I take it out to show the guy and he presses all over it, and while he is telling me my battery is swollen and causing the screen to bend, he turns it on and my screen was split in half! I couldn't use half my screen! I work 2 blocks away and have been very careful with my phone (have had a bent-ish screen for months!) so I really don't think this happened in my pocket. I called him out on it as soon as I saw the screen and he said "Look, you can't even use the screen now". He proceeded to talk about other things with my phone and didn't address the problem of him breaking my screen. He priced a screen and battery for me, but I declined and walked out because he broke my screen and absolutely refused to acknowledge it. I went back to the office, called this place and asked to speak to the manager. He asked what was wrong and I told him about the staff breaking my screen. He reveals that the guy I'm speaking with on the phone is the one who "helped" me in the store, and said that he is the manager and owned the store. I calmly explained to him what he did and how I watched him do it right in front of my face. He REFUSED to take responsibility and tried offering a $10 discount for both screen and battery instead. I said no thanks, and to have a nice day before hanging up. I am SO upset - I ended up just buying a new phone since it was about the same cost of what he would charge for a screen and battery. Find someone honest and who knows what they are doing to fix your cell phone - not here!

resp.text: Megan we’re sorry you had a bad experience with us and we do remember your issue. You came in with a swollen battery and an already cracked screen. The phone was off when you came in and we turned it on to a discolored lcd. You came in with a cracked screen and swollen battery and left with a cracked screen and swollen battery even after giving you a special repair price due to the repair being more than one issue and you mentioned working near by as we do like to be extra friendly with our neighbors and business close to our locations. The price you were given is a price no other repair store would give and if they did we would match but in all we’re sorry for any inconvenience you may have had coming to our store and would like to mention that the special price quote still stands if you wish to stop by. Thank you and have a great day!

name: Jeff Jones
text: I spent hours at Best Buy and 30 minutes at the Genius Bar. They all gave up on fixing my iPhone 6 (using Apple’s approved troubleshoot and repair process). But Phone Clinic fixed it in less than 15 minutes! Also very affordable. Staff is kind, knowledgeable and fast. I highly recommend them, especially if you have a phone out of warranty.

name: Amber 0301
text: Love the UAB Phone Clinic! They are super fast and the pricing is fantastic! Much cheaper than anywhere else!!!!

name: Christian Pray
text: Very nice and professional went in for a cracked screen, and brought in an extra battery he installed free of charge.

name: Jennifer Bertke
text: I had two phone screens replaced here, an iPhone 7 Plus and an iPhone XS Max. Within a few months both phones had the screen literally falling off the device. I could flip my phone over and the whole top half of the screen would detach. While the service is fairly quick and cheaper than an Apple repair I highly recommend spending a little more getting it done through Apple to be assured of a quality repair.

name: Caroline Brown
text: The people here were so helpful! Babek (Bob) was so patient with us as we were trying to get my international friend’s new number and phone set up. He went above and beyond. I highly recommend this place.

name: Jeffry Schmidt
text:
Outstanding Customer service.  Other repair shops could not get the screen I needed and these gentleman had the part and phone fixed within 24 hrs!
Unbelievable Service!

name: Nick Buzzelli
text: Amazing customer service at the Phone Clinic UAB. Took my iPad in because the screen was displaying white bars and had a speedy repair on it. However, after noticing that the new touchscreen was unresponsive in the top-left corner, making the 'messages' app unopenable, a few days after getting it fixed, I took the iPad back to the Phone Clinic and they repaired the digitizer on the spot, free of charge! I highly recommenced the Phone Clinic to anyone in need of tablet repair. Super friendly staff who genuinely cares about making sure that they get the job done right.

name: Rawan Alrawi
text: Highly recommended. Quick, walk in service. Friendly staff. This is my second time here, I needed my phone to be fixed, it only took him few minutes to fix it and didn’t ask me to pay for his service

name: Mitchell Appleberry
text: Fast and friendly!! I came in with a broken screen and left under an hour fixed. Competitive pricing and great customer service.

name: Breanna Marsh
text: Highly recommended. Took less than 30 minutes to fix my phone plus they dont over charge like other phone repair shops. I came here before and it took 15 minutes to fix my iPhone 7.

name: Claire Jackson
text: They replaced my screen and my screen lights up randomly and glitches.  my battery that was perfectly fine before now drains at amazing speeds. It used to last all day before the repair. I’m really mad that I used them and didn’t just let Apple fix it for only a little more money.

name: King_Xl 99
text: Great customer services, fast repair, great quality parts, highly recommend!!

name: Taniyia Byrd
text: Came in and got the phone I was looking for and his customer service was great.

name: Bre Wiggins
text: I took my phone in last week to get repaired. By that evening my phone screen went completely black ,and didn't turn back on. I returned the next day to explain that I was just there 24 hours before and my phone didn't work. He verified the purchase and fixed it again. The graphics aren't the same. It has been 7 days and my phone keyboard types on its own and continues to shift between apps, makes calls, and taps on things without me touching it. I will not be returning to this location.

name: Three and me
text: My phone is perfect. I’m clumsy and my son literally throws my phone down the stairs every other day. They give you fast and affordable service. Stop letting your friends fix your phone and take it to a professional 👌🏾☺️🔥

name: Tammy Kennedy
text: Wonderful service quick repair and great prices i highly recommend this store

name: Tammy Kennedy
text: Wonderful service quick repair and great prices i highly recommend this store

text: Great fast service, really good prices!

name: M .YKicKs
text: Polar is very polite, he fixed my phone in 7 minutes, oh gosh i can’t believe it🥰

name: K&N
text: They have fixed my phone twice they are amazing

name: Clifford Kennon
text: Good service yesterday with an old Galaxy S4 screen repair. Needed to be able to get in the phone to retrieve some info.  Fast and friendly service. Got a free screen protector too!

name: Latoria Hawkins
text: Went in for screen repair and was told it was going to be 30 min. I was out in 15! Quick professional service and I definitely recommend!

name: Rylo Rylo
text: I can find find any kind of protector for phones  they r so nice and friendly

name: Preston Watts
text: Bob was great! They fixed my son’s broken iPad screen and it was same day service! I highly recommend this store!

name: Jess Taylor
text: This place uses poor quality screens. Do yourself a favor and avoid this place. Got my iPhone screen replaced a few month ago. Immediately had to ask for a replacement since the screen was sticking out of the phone in the top right corner and flickering like crazy. When I went back they charged be extra and "replaced" it with and "original" apple screen. 1 month later the screen stopped working completely and the corner that stuck out and flickers cracked from the pressure without any impact. I went back again and had to argue since they wanted to charge me to replace the defect screen. Eventually they replaced it for free. After a few weeks  the new screen started to malfunction, AGAIN. This time the touch input is not working correctly. He further refuses to replace or refund the screen. Avoid this place and go somewhere else, it will safe time and money.

name: JaMarius Royal
text: Great place to get your phone and computer looked at. Best specialist ever

name: Phillip Kuhn
text: Phone Clinic is simple and efficient. Walk in, tell them what is needed, they give you an understandable price, and 15 minutes later, they're finished with great results. They are excellent for phone screen repairs.

name: Lindsay Stager
text: Fast service and a great quality repair!

name: LL Cook
text: Very quick service, also gave me the best price for phone repair

name: Darnisha Wade
text: Cheap price fast service, Polad is really nice and gentle

name: JaMarius Royal
text: Definitely fixed my phone in a quick manner and the customer service is amazing!

name: jessica morrison
text: Excellent customer service. iPhone 8 repaired in 10 minutes. Superb work!!! Would recommend to anyone. Much better prices than local competitors.

name: Diane Natale
text:
I took a chromebook into UAB Phone Clinic. I asked the owner if he could
tell me why the charger would not go in the charging port. He took the chromebook to the back and came it 5 minutes later and said that he replaced the charging port and I owed him $70. A few days later ( 8 days )
later I cannot put the charger in the charging port. I called UAB clinic and a man said answered and said they were closing for the day and I could come in on Monday. I really needed to use the computer so I took it to another repair shop and told them that I just had the charging port replaced and I couldn't figure out what was wrong. UAB Phone Clinic had not repaired the charging port. The original port was still in the computer.
Evidently the man at UAB just straightened out the pins and charged me for a new charging port. Be very careful in UAB Phone Clinic. I wish I would have read through the reviews. I noticed that there were 5 stars but didn't take the time to read through them. I have talked to several people that have had bad experiences with this place but didn't take the time to
do a review.

name: Michael Trammell
text: Fast, easy, and professional service at a great price. They've definitely earned themselves a repeat customer.

name: Delisha Curtis
text: My Phone Was Cracked & Blacked Out & They Fixed It Good As New In Under 1 Hour! The Customer Service Was Amazing As Well! Definitely Recommend 100%!

name: David Walsh
text: Excellent service. Two phones misdiagnosed from other “repair shops”. The owner knows his business and how to repair phones. I will bring any phones to only this place from now on. He made a customer for life.

name: TheLifeOfA
text: They did a great job on my phone in just 30 mins!! Good prices

name: Chad Hyde
text: These guys are fantastic. Brought in a Google Pixel 4 XL for a new screen. After installation the phone wouldn't charge and they had me bring it back in and it was fixed in less than ten minutes. Top notch service. I highly recommend these guys.

name: Twynette Bates
text: Went in to get my iPhone XS Max screen repaired and they were professional and have great fast service.. had my phone fix in about 10 mins and the price was great compared to other companies.... l recommend them and will use them for any of my phone needs!!

name: Greg Lawrence
text: This is the place to go for cell phone repair.  The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and honest.  The prices are fantastic!

name: Allison Fusilier
text: Phone screen was supposed to be replaced and was not. Worker was rude each time I had to go back because he continuously failed to fix the problem.  He eventually admitted to not actually replacing the screen, and did not refund. Absolutely not worth wasting your money or your time here.

name: mashala maynard
text: My iPhone screen was shattered & blacked out in certain areas on the screen. Phone Clinic fixed my phone in under an hour for a great price. A tempered glass protector was included with the service as well. I am highly satisfied with this business! 10/10 recommended

name: Jackson Tate
text: Absolute pleasure dealing with these folks!! In and out in under 1 hour. Would highly recommend!

text: i like this store!! the customer service is very good, very sweet and helpful! i appreciate them fixing my phone   👉🏽👈🏽

name: Lukas Carullo
text: Be careful, they are not using original Apple screens although you pay premium, $159, for exactly that. The screen is flickering, freezing up constantly, iOS does not enable true tone and it sticks out of the phone case. After a month, the screen broke without external impact. I assume due to being not in place correctly, but might also have been a manufacturer’s issue. They replaced it free of charge... but then 2 weeks later the touch input started to malfunction and triggering random input. We wanted a refund but owner is refusing to help at all. Stay away from this store at all cost!

name: Latoya Moore
text: Good people they helped me a lot

text: Great experience!  Bought IPhone XR at excellent price.  Great customer service.  I would definitely recommend!

I am really very happy 🤗
You are professionals 🤗
Thank you so much.
They fixed my Samsun s20  same day.

name: Brandon Smith
text: Dropped off and went to grab some food, had it ready within 30 minutes and everything works perfectly and looks beautiful again! Friendly service!

name: C. L. MAY
text: The service was impeccable! The staff replaced my IPhone battery within minutes. There was no scheduling an appointment online and then waiting, like the Apple Store. I walked in and they repaired my phone in minutes.

name: Alisha Curtis
text: My phone was cracked up and they fixed it really good !!!! I 100% percent recommend they fix it really fast 1 hour :) And really good price limits nothing very expensive:)

name: Melanie George
text: They told me $280 on the phone to fix my screen. After they took 2 hours to replace it, they charged me $350. The screen doesn't work as well as my broken screen did and they lied about needing other repairs done. Said I "had to have" something replaced for an additional $100 or the phone wouldn't work, but when they realized they didn't have the part, told me to just come back later for it. I left feeling hustled and overcharged.

name: Emma tuscaloosa
text: My Samsung Note 10 plus was cracked in both sides. I compared prices and quality of screens with few different shops. Phone Clinic had 20$ lower than the others and they claim its OEM. So far so good, works like factory. Will post if anything changes...

name: allen fuller
text:
Awesome service
These guys say what they do and do what they say
Real men of their word
Especially Bob ,🏁🏁🏁

name: Jr Hush
text:
nice place
i got top cash for my phones

name: Delexus Haley
text: Good service .Thanks guys

name: Richard Deen
text:
Just got my screen replaced 2 weeks ago and already cracked again.
Had the phone two years before and dropped many times and never had this issue before.
They dont use OEM screens even though you pay the price.
Also my speaker is going out after he got done with it. When it was fine before.
Wouldn't recommend

resp.text:
Hey Richard,

Sorry to hear that. In fact we provide 6 month warranty for screens we install. And most of the time customers praise our quality.

We would like to help with this problem and if it is dues to manifacturer error we will give you a free screen.

Our outer screen grade is OEM even for premium aftermarket parts.

Problem might be dues to installation error or something but hard to tell before we see it.

In any case we will be glad to give you 3D 9H full view tempered glass which is impossible to break glass with.

Please call or txt me at 2058875151

name: Cody Poole
text: I came in with a iPhone X that wouldn’t charge. Staff made sure it was the charging port that was damaged and didn’t just need to be cleaned.  I left the phone overnight and it was repaired to perfection by the time promised the next day.  Highly recommend.

text: Friendly, fast, service. When the guy said 10 minutes... he wasn’t lying. It was 10 minutes. I’m going to have to call him Dr. Phone lol. Thanks!

text: I drove over my iPhone 7. They fixed the screen and the camera within an hour. They have also fixed a cracked iPad screen for me. Service is fast, reasonable prices and courteous.

name: Ross Brown
text: They have fixed my phones multiple times. They are trustworthy and do a great job.

name: Emily Green
text:
Quick service, done well, reasonably priced, the gentleman was very professional, and he let me know about some issues with my phone.
This was the second time I had to get my screen repaired...the first place probably caused some of the issues (parts inside my phone were missing) and they certainly didn't let me know about anything and in addition they were overpriced!
Bottom line, this is the best place in Birmingham to have your phone repaired!

text: This was a very fast exchange and awesome customer service. Took about 15 minutes to get mine replaced and it’s good as new

name: omar lopez
text: Screens are cheap, replaced a iPhone X screen and in a month lines started to pop up and half the screen would not respond, they switched it no problem. Happened again right after that with the lines. Brought it to the store and they told me that I purposefully did that to the phone and wanted me to buy a new screen.

name: Patrick Wood
text:
My iPhone was messed up. I could hear people just fine but people couldn’t hear me (mic issue). I took my phone to Phone Clinic UAB and the “doctor” quickly diagnosed it, and repaired it while I waited. Less than $17.00. Had I taken to the Apple Store they would have recommended a new phone or sent it off for repair. I recommend.

Update: 9/2/19 So my home button on my iPhone wouldn’t work. I could access my apps and icons but only by sliding my phone, and it was a hassle so I went crack to the clinic and they made a “home button” appear on the screen enabling me to bypass the faulty home button on the phone. For free! The clinic rocks!

name: AKRL Youth
text: good

text: Perfect

text: I can definitely say my phone looks great! No “after the fix” defects. Functionality is still perfect!

text: The staff was super friendly and the service was fast! Best price around, too!!

name: AKRL Youth
text: good

name: Linda Tano
text: Perfect

name: Kevin Cassidy
text: Dropped an iPhone 6S and cracked the glass around 4 pm at a hobby lobby about an hour away from here. Called around to compare prices nearby, was advertised $54.99 compared to $120 everywhere elsewhere, I came down here. Came in and saw the price for a 6S was actually $89.99, and $54.99 was the starting price for an iPhone 5. Seeing as it was still better than $120, I decided to drop the phone off to have them fix it. Was done in just 30 minutes, result looked flawless, and even came with a screen protector as a gift. Would give 5 stars if the phone advertised price was accurate, but overall a great experience.

name: javarro hoskins
text: Good job guys, fast and relaibale

text: Really good place

name: Bri B
text: The reviews don't lie. They finished my screen replacement in under 20 minutes, I got a discount for using cash (on top of the already cheap price), and great discounts on accessories. Very polite and helped me test out all the functions to make sure I didn't break anything else when I dropped my phone. Best price and quickest repair I've been able to find anywhere by a long shot! Thank you!

text: Very professional service

text: I take my phone in here like every other day and they always have the best prices and they are so respectful and they always get the job done quick !!

text: I love the atmosphere there!!  The men was so nice and helpful! I have an IPhone 6 Plus that wouldn’t charge. They put a new battery in within 30mins! I’m so thankful and pleased with them! You guys ROCK!!!

name: Autumn Estridge
text: They did a great job!! The employee who helped me was super polite and even gave me a phone case and screen protector at no charge. The price was awesome and definitely worth it and (again) the employee was nice as heck.

name: Arrin Weatherspoon
text: Very responsive , fast service , second time coming , love the way they treat their customers. I would definitely recommend to others. I break phones regularly so I know I'll be back again. Thanks I love you guys because you always come through. Y'all come shop with my boys they clutch 👌🏾💪🏾

name: Joe Mode
text: Does great work, every time.

name: Jessica Latten
text: As soon as I got the phone fixed I had issues with the screen turning black randomly. Also the GPS is way off on the phone. Not only that, the phone is no longer water proof but he didn’t tell me that it would not longer be water proof until after he fixed it. Besides that, when I tried to get it fixed, he said that it was out of warranty and claimed I had it fixed way earlier than I did. I double checked and I got my phone repaired at least two weeks after he claimed I did.

resp.text:
Hi Jessica sorry for your inconvenience but we remember you and have it in our system you told us you attempted to work on your phone yourself and we told you before repair we can’t warranty anything other than the screen because your phone was missing parts and had ripped flex cables when it came in due to the screen being ripped off instead of done correctly. Being said that feel free to bring it in anytime and we can diagnose and let you know what other issues you may have and what it will cost but we don’t have any guarantees for phones that have been worked on by nonprofessionals.
Thank you and have a great day

name: Elbert Boothby
text: Best experience I have ever had with a phone repair. Apple Store and other "fix it" places have your phone for up to 7 hours. My 8+ was fixed in about 30 minutes and he gave me a discount off the price even though they are extremely expensive and hard to get (it was the only one he had so he could've taken advantage but did the opposite). Farris helped me and I will never go anywhere else. As a matter of fact, I took my 7+ that was dead and he had it up and running perfectly in no time and at a fraction of what anyone else charges. Wish I could give Farris and the store 7 STARS *******

name: Wanda Sailes
text: Polad WAS GREAT !

name: Lynn Gibson
text: Wow! 4.9! Figures! Lol! Been meaning to come write review for this business for awhile, because it is by far the best place to get your phone fixed whether water damage or cracked screen-have had both done here, multiple times! The owner Farris (hope I spelled his name correctly) is a very nice person with much integrity! Best technicians who know their stuff, best customer service and best prices! Go here please and support this small business, you won't be disappointed! :)

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind review  miss Gibson and we are happy your experience with Phone Clinic was a good one. Though we hope your next repair is far from now we will be happy to help you anytime.

Thank you from Phone Clinic

text: Excellent service. Very courteous and timely.  Fairly priced on screen replacement.  Representative went out of way to help. Will use services again if needed.

text: Guys know how to get you to purchase an item. Overall great customer service.

name: Brandon Teal
text: Second time taking my phone here and it was done in 20 minutes.  However, I just took my phone to the Apple Store to address another issue and they discovered that the screen was not replaced correctly and thus are going to have to replace it again.  No problems with the service and speediness, but if the screens aren't put back together correctly then what's the point.

name: Arrin Weatherspoon
text: Very responsive , fast service , second time coming , love the way they treat their customers. I would definitely recommend to others. I break phones regularly so I know I'll be back again. Thanks I love you guys because you always come through. Y'all come shop with my boys they clutch 👌🏾💪🏾

text: Good job good service Thanks

name: Jenniferl Ramos
text: Khan was amazing! He was very helpful, quick, friendly and efficient! We were going to the restaurant next door, (T-Bones... crazy good cheesesteaks and water ice) and saw Phone clinic so we stopped on and boy am i glad we did.

name: Carl Murray
text: The service was good. If you have an iPhone they have special rates and a scale so it is really reasonable especially on anything 6s and later. If you a glass front and back waterproof  phone such as A Galaxy S7 or newer repair are a lot more expensive. The turn around time at this shop is great. It took  about two hours to have the screen on my Galaxy S8 replaced. When my Samsung J7 broke it took an hour for them to call and say they would have to order the parts. If they have to order parts it depends on the part but it will take at least two days.

name: LaToinette Cooley
text: Yes really good service's

name: William Mcalexander
text: Great Job. I had an excellent experience here. Timely. Less expensive than other repair shops. Written 30-day warranty. My 5s screen was repaired in 20 mins. A different shop said I needed and LCD screen The Phone Clinic UAB technician said my LCD was fine and did not need repair. HUGE SAVINGS!! I will continue to use them.

name: Kim Matthews
text:
Very quick and courteous service that is affordable. I got the office hours mixed up so arrived like 10-15 minutes before closing. My daughter's screen was shattered on her Iphone 6S Plus and the phone was disabled.  The tech replaced the screen in like 10 minutes and also gave me verbal instructions on how to restore the phone. Glad I chose to go there, I was stressed about things not working out but things went well.

name: Catherine C
text:
Farris was great; my iPhone 5 got water damaged and not only was he patient when I didn’t take his initial suggestion and pressed for a screen replacement rather than just waiting it out, he also didn’t charge me for the time he spent trying multiple screens (only to find that it wouldn’t help, like he’d thought) and was honest that I should just let this phone run its course rather than sinking more money into it. (iPhone 5s are notoriously bad at dealing with water damage?)

Oh, he also had all this done within an hour (so I went and got lunch, did some internet surfing...) and didn’t get upset that the phone number I gave him to contact me by was the same number of the phone he was fixing. Silly me.

Thanks Farris! I’m from out of town but if I’m back and have more problems, I’ll definitely be coming to find you.

resp.text:
Thank you Catherine for the review and most of all for stopping by the Phone Clinic for your repair and if there is anything els we can do for you we would be more than happy to.

Thank you and we hope you have a great day

text: Great plae!! Fast friendly service. Been twice and I highly recommend (:

name: Shir
text:
I came in a few months ago with a cracked screen and the screen was replaced. A couple of weeks later my phone was dropped the phone landed on the corner with the case taking direct impact. I also had a screen protector. The screen cracked in the corner.

I have had my phone for a couple of years and the only time the screen cracked previously was when it landed face first without the screen protector. This leads me to believe the quality of the aftermarket screen was not very good.

resp.text:
Hello  Shir, we’re sorry you had a bad experience with us. Aftermarket screens have the same durability as the oem quality the difference is in the picture quality of the lcd only but the glass is the same, also it’s hard to compare the drop it took recently to previous drop lots of factors come into play. You also mentioned it was dropped on the corner of screen which is a very critical place of impact it’s the easiest place to crack on an iPhone specially if it’s the plus size phone but if you stop by we will try our best to make sure you get a better experience with us with a discounted price and free screen protector.

Thank you
Phone Clinic management

text: I went to get my phone screen repaired, and originally the guy told me $200. I mentioned that Apple will fix it for $149, and he was "suddenly" able to offer me this price instead. Sketchy. They were basically trying to scam me for an extra $50 dollars. I didn't bother getting my phone fixed there after that.

resp.text:
We have firm prices on all iPhone models. Also, we have price competition.
This customer asked  the best offer and told us she student. After that, we made her some discount.  We explained to her what we will do and we will replace Screen. We have  #90 DAY  warranty policy like  Apple.
We are business more than 5 years and be honest are our rules.

Tried two other places, that was a mistake, other places didn't hear what I was saying. Whereas the Phone Clinic listened to what I had already done, how the problem developed, and what I wanted done. If you want confidence and sincerity in a business, this is where you come. Recommending to all my friends who have phone issues. There is a reason why this has a near unanimous 5 star rating.
